desc: Being born in Japan and traveled to over 45 countries, I have seen many beautiful handcrafts in different parts of the world. From my personal experience, I know that using favorite handmade coffee cup or using a handwoven scarfs or giving loved ones such crafts can make you and your loved ones life a little richer.

layout.text: Give yourself or your loved ones a hand made lacquer-ware from Japan or handwoven textiles from Uzbekistan. Having handmade crafts in your home makes your daily life a little richer. We source our handcrafts from ethical and environmentally friendly source as much as possible.
